closeness.lowDesc: Distances from finances; avoids checking balances or engaging with details.
closeness.midDesc: Can face money calmly and realistically without emotional swings.
closeness.highDesc: Monitors constantly; heightened vigilance or worry around spending and savings.
closeness.signature: Measures emotional comfort and engagement with financial reality.

control.lowDesc: Feels acted upon by circumstances; lacks perceived control over money.
control.midDesc: Takes deliberate action while allowing flexibility when needed.
control.highDesc: Over-monitors, tightly controls finances, struggles to relax rules even when appropriate.
control.signature: Gauges how one balances initiative and adaptability in money management.

selfWorth.lowDesc: Sees finances as proof of inadequacy; shame or comparison-driven.
selfWorth.midDesc: Values self-worth beyond status; open to growth without defensiveness.
selfWorth.highDesc: Links achievement to superiority; resistant to vulnerability or feedback.
selfWorth.signature: Reflects whether money reinforces or expresses a healthy sense of self.

boundary.lowDesc: Gives or spends to maintain harmony; difficulty asserting limits.
boundary.midDesc: Gives and receives with clarity; generosity and protection coexist.
boundary.highDesc: Highly protective of resources; cautious or resistant to shared spending.
boundary.signature: Captures how one balances generosity, reciprocity, and personal security.

growth.lowDesc: Avoids financial experimentation; prefers comfort over improvement.
growth.midDesc: Learns through reflection and small, steady adjustments.
growth.highDesc: Seeks constant optimization; restless pursuit of “better” without pause.
growth.signature: Indicates openness to learning and capacity for sustained improvement.
